description: The Cimon GTX is a rugged water proof hiking boot that strikes the balance between lightweight, durability and support. The Cimon is hand made in Montebelluna, Italy and features AKU’s proprietary Elica Stride System for all day comfort and enhanced performance as well as an injected polyurethane midsole for contoured support and durability.
name: Aku Cimon GTX - Mens

specs.value: Keep your feet dry in all conditions with the integrated waterproof Gore-Tex Performance Comfort membrane
